Text: #Coronavirus: Stunning new numbers. Running totals - 9,171 confirmed cases worldwide vs 7,711 China cases yesterday; 213 deaths vs 130 yesterday. More than 12,000 suspected cases. 1,476 in serious or critical condition. ALL regions of China are reporting cases. h/t @V2019N

- 9,171 confirmed #coronavirus cases worldwide - 12,167 suspected cases - 213 deaths - 1,476 in serious/critical condition - 150 treated and released - all regions of #China reporting cases - 23 territories reporting cases
@CDCgov CDC webinar for clinicians on #coronavirus #2019nCoV

Update -#coronavirus cases confirmed now in 23 territories. -Italy confirmed 2 cases, Philippines (1), India (1) #2019nCoV -World Health Organization declares #PHEIC -over 8,000 cases in #China -#US State Department authorizes diplomatic staff to evacuate #China

What an absolute abomination of a press conference regarding #coronavirus #nCoV19! Not ONE question received straight answer. No clarification or leadership from the @WHO. The world deserves much more than this. #coronavirus #coronavirusec #China @V2019N
I’m just calling it coronavirus, rolls off the tongue easier

@WHO @DrTedros declares a #PHEIC #coronavirus Concern about virus spreading to countries with weaker health systems and who are not prepared to deal with it. WHO has confidence in China's capacity to control outbreak.

Messaging from #publichealth, scientists, physicians that the #coronavirus is not as dangerous as the flu (several stories this week) could erode public trust. There are many unknowns, no vaccine or antivirals approved for #coronavirus unlike flu.
Another: People who are siloed in ID/public health seem to think the public is panicking about the news. But this messaging that the flu is worse than coronavirus could backfire.
Pas #coronavirus ou par??

It is not sars - sars is from the family of coronaviruses, as is mers. The novella Coronavirus is also of the same family. Sars, novella Coronavirus (what we have now) and mers are similar but not the same. NC is more contagious than sars and mers.
My point was not worth pissing you off. SARS Is caused by coronavirus. I am conflating the two, like lopping HIV and AIDS into the same basket. I'm sorry that I scuffed your thickest of skin. My bad.

I have heard on the radio that UK pandemic contingency plans include converting school gyms/stadiums/swimming pools into field hospitals. So why are Chinese building new hospitals? Doesn't make sense #nCoV19 #coronavirus @howroute @V2019N

Q: How should clinicians handle? A: CDC guide if they come into contact. If someone comes in & presents w/ respiratory involvement & fever, ask "Have you been in #China recently?" If yes, mask on them, isolation room, contact @CDCgov -Fauci #coronavirus
